description: This table contains the Anesthesia Staff information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: ANESTH_STAFF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anesthesia staff type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ANESTH_RTLS_OFF_YN
columns.description:
Whether RTLS tracking has been manually turned off for the anesthesia staff on this case log.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ANESTH_STAFF_MOD_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The time of the last modification to the anesthesia staff on this case log.
